mapper.select: select * from infrMember ORDER BY infrMmSeq DESC
select infrMmId ,infrMmPw ,infrMmSeq ,infrMmName ,count(*) count from infrMember where 1=1 and infrMmId = #{infrMmId} and infrMmPw = MD5(#{infrMmPw})
mapper.update: UPDATE infrMember SET infrMmDelNy = 0 WHERE infrMmSeq = #{infrMmSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT a.infrMmSeq ,b.bdTitle ,b.regDatetime ,(SELECT COUNT(aa.bdLikeSeq) FROM bdLike aa where 1=1 AND aa.bdSeq = b.bdSeq)as bdLikeSeq FROM infrMember a LEFT JOIN board b on b.infrMmSeq = a.infrMmSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.infrMmSeq = #{infrMmSeq} ORDER BY b.bdSeq DESC
SELECT a.infrMmSeq ,a.infrMmId FROM infrMember a WHERE 1=1 AND a.infrMmId = #{infrMmId}
SELECT a.infrMmSeq ,a.infrMmId ,a.infrMmName FROM infrMember a WHERE 1=1 AND a.infrMmId = #{infrMmId} AND a.infrMmPw = #{infrMmPw}
